5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sahl bin Mu’adh bin Anas that his father said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever steps over the people’s necks on Friday has built a bridge to Hell.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنْ تَخَطِّي النَّاسَ، يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the prohibition of stepping over the people’s shoulders on Friday
